LanguageData.Epona_Idris.label: Idris Buttermilk
LanguageData.Epona_Idris.description: Idris Buttermilk. Baron and playwright of Eponantua./n/nHe studied the brutal aristocratic culture of Epoland for over 10 years, leaving behind several masterpieces. We will sing several "tragedies" based on the culture of Epoland.\n\n(Randy who fights a lot. The rest is mild.)
